title: Naj: Why I'm not here as much (Galexieretter will like this)
content:
Well... I'm growing up, and that means more homework, and tons of extra stuff. I am always busy!

I am making this announcment, as to tell you officially, that I, Najawa, am sorta disappering from the Internet (as you notice, my site is down... but while it is still paying for itself, download firefox, and join Google adsense, cause then it may reapeer)

But yeah... I won't be as active... like, once every month or two.

Cya guys. Oh, and you might notice a big spike in 8 years: That would be me out of collage.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

Until then!!!

-- Najiwa --

(Which I found also works as a name, cause my middle name is JAmes, but I can use JIm if I wanted to).

But for you to remember me by:Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/tough_guys_wear_pink.jpg[/img]
Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --
